settings.name: %emoji_settings% Settings %emoji_settings%
settings.content: Setup and settings such as `/connect` or `/disable`

information.content:
**All commands in a category** can be viewed with: **/help <category>**
**Still need help?** => [Support Discord Server](%invite_link%)

**More info about a command** can be viewed with: **/help <command>**
**Still need help?** => [Support Discord Server](%invite_link%)

disabled.description:
You can find helpful information here. 
 ```diff
- [COMMAND DISABLED]```

no_username.title: No Username specified
no_username.description: %emoji_warning% Please ping a user or specify a minecraft-username.

no_advancement.title: No Advancement Specified
no_advancement.description: %emoji_warning% Please specify the advancement name or id.

could_not_read_file.title: Could not read file
could_not_read_file.description: %emoji_error% Could not read advancement file. Please try again.
could_not_read_file.console: Error reading advancement file from disk %error%

no_username.title: No Username specified
no_username.description: %emoji_warning% Please ping a user or specify a minecraft-username.

could_not_read_file.title: Could not read file
could_not_read_file.description: %emoji_error% Could not read inventory file. Please try again.
could_not_read_file.console: Error reading inventory file from disk %error%

could_not_parse.title: Could not read inventory
could_not_parse.console: Error trying to parse player nbt %error%

no_image.console: Could not find item image %item_name%. Applying text...

no_username.title: No Username specified
no_username.description: %emoji_warning% Please ping a user or specify a minecraft-username.

could_not_read_file.title: Could not read file
could_not_read_file.description: %emoji_error% Could not read stats file. Please try again.
could_not_read_file.console: Error reading stats file from disk %error%

could_not_parse.title: Could not find category
could_not_parse.description: %emoji_error% %username% has never done anything in this category.
could_not_parse.console: Error trying to parse stat json %error%

stat_message.killed_by: has been killed **%stat_value%** times by a **%stat_name%**

no_permission.title: No Permission
no_permission.description: :no-entry: This command can only be used with the `Ban Member` permission!

no_username.title: No Username specified
no_username.description: %emoji_warning% Please ping a user or specify a minecraft-username.

no_permission.title: No Permission
no_permission.description: :no-entry: This command can only be used with the `Ban Member` permission!

no_username.title: No Username specified
no_username.description: %emoji_warning% Please ping a user or specify a minecraft-username.

no_image.title: No Image specified
no_image.description: %emoji_warning% Please attach an image, specify an image url or ping someone.

could_not_get_size.title: Could not get size
could_not_get_size.description: %emoji_error% Could not get size of image. `/help loadingscreen` for correct usage.

could_not_load.title: Could not load image
could_not_load.description: %emoji_warning% Could not load image. `/help loadingscreen` for correct usage.

success.title: Minecraft Loading Screen
success.description: %emoji_success% Here's your Minecraft loading screen! Make sure to put it in: `<resourcepack>/assets/minecraft/textures/gui/title/`

no_username.title: No Username specified
no_username.description: %emoji_warning% Please ping a user or specify a minecraft-username.

no_message.title: No Message specified
no_message.description: %emoji_warning% Please specify the message you want to send.

response_warning.title: Send Message
response_warning.description: Warning trying to send message to player [**%username%**]: %response%

no_font.title: No Font specified
no_font.description: %emoji_warning% Please specify a font. To make a minecraft styled font use `/text minecrafter`. Use `/help text` to view all special fonts.

no_color.title: No Color specified
no_color.description:
%emoji_warning% Please specify a color. All color ids can be found here:
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/color_value#color_keywords

could_not_apply_text.title: Could not apply Text
could_not_apply_text.description: %emoji_error% Please check if you specified a valid font or color.

no_permission.title: No Permission
no_permission.description: %emoji_no_entry% This command can only be used by admins.

no_text_channel.title: No Text Channel specified
no_text_channel.description: %emoji_warning% Please mention a text, thread or news channel.

not_author.title: No Permission
not_author.description: %emoji_warning% Only the command sender can select message types.

not_collected.title: Select Message Types
not_collected.description: Select all message types you want the bot to send. (Time ran out)

already_responded.title: Select Message Types
already_responded.description: Select all message types you want the bot to send. (Already responded)

could_not_write_file.title: Could not save channel
could_not_write_file.description: %emoji_error% Couldn't save channel. Please try again.

choose.title: Select Message Types
choose.description: Select all message types you want the bot to send. (You have 20 seconds to select)

chat.label: Chat messages
chat.description: Send a message every time a player chats.

join.label: Join messages
join.description: Send a message every time a player joins the server.

leave.label: Leave messages
leave.description: Send a message every time a player leaves the server.

advancements.label: Advancement messages
advancements.description: Send a message every time a player completes an advancement.

death.label: Death messages
death.description: Send a message every time a player dies.

commands.label: Command messages
commands.description: Send a message every time a player executes a command.

start.label: Startup messages
start.description: Send a message every time the server starts up.

close.label: Shutdown messages
close.description: Send a message every time the server shuts down.

no_permission.title: No Permission
no_permission.console: %emoji_no_entry% This command can only be used by admins.

no_credentials.title: No Credentials specified
no_credentials.description: Please specify your ftp credentials! Use `/help connect` for more information!

invalid_port.title: Invalid Port specified
invalid_port.description: %emoji_warning% Please specify a port that is bigger than 0 and smaller than 65536.

no_username.title: No Username specified
no_username.description: %emoji_warning% Please specify your minecraft java-edition account name.

invalid_method.title: Invalid Method specified
invalid_method.description: %emoji_warning% Method [**%method%**] is not a valid connection method.

user_pinged.title: No Username specified
user_pinged.description: %emoji_warning% Don't ping someone. Specify your **minecraft java-edition account name** instead.

version_below_11.title: Version below 1.11
version_below_11.description: %emoji_warning% The advancement command might not work because advancements don't exist in your minecraft version yet.

version_below_7.title: Version below 1.7
version_below_7.description: %emoji_warning% The stat and advancement commands might not work because stats and advancements don't exist in your minecraft version yet.

connecting.title: Connecting...
connecting.description: Connecting to ftp... (Can take up to one minute)

searching_level.title: Searching for world
searching_level.description: %emoji_success% Successfully connected with the sftp server. Finding world folder... (Can take up to one minute)

could_not_dm.title: Could not DM
could_not_dm.description: %emoji_warning% Could not DM you. Verifying in the current channel...

could_not_connect_ftp.title: Could not connect
could_not_connect_ftp.description: %emoji_error% Could not connect to server with ftp or sftp. Please check your credentials and try again.
could_not_connect_ftp.console: Could not connect with ftp or sftp.

could_not_find_level.title: Could not find World
could_not_find_level.description: %emoji_error% Could not find world folder. Please specify the world path manually.

could_not_make_folder.title: Could not Save Credentials
could_not_make_folder.description: %emoji_error% Could not save credentials. Please try again.

could_not_write_file.title: Could not Save Credentials
could_not_write_file.description: %emoji_error% Could not save credentials. Please try again.

ftp.title: Connected to Server
ftp.description: %emoji_success% Successfully connected to the ftp server.

account.title: Connected to Account
account.description: %emoji_success% Successfully connected with username: **%username%** and UUID: **%uuid%**

verification.title: Code Verification
verification.description:
Please check the console of your minecraft server and enter the verification code from the server console below this message.
**You have 3 minutes to reply.**

no_type.title: No Type specified
no_type.description: %emoji_warning% Please specify the type you want to disable (`commands`, `stats, `advancements`) or `list` if you want to list all disabled commands/stats/advancements.

no_permission.title: No Permission
no_permission.description: %emoji_no_entry% This command can only be used by admins.

no_disable.title: No Disable specified
no_disable.description: %emoji_warning% Please specify the %type% you want to disable.

invalid_method.title: Invalid Method specified
invalid_method.description: %emoji_warning% You can only disconnect from `ftp`, `plugin` or `account`.

invalid_protocol.title: Invalid Protocol specified
invalid_protocol.description: %emoji_warning% Your server is not connected with %method%

no_type.title: No Type specified
no_type.description: %emoji_warning% Please specify the type you want to enable (`commands`, `stats, `advancements`).

no_enable.title: No Enable specified
no_enable.description: %emoji_warning% Please specify the command, stat or advancement you want to enable.

no_permission.title: No Permission
no_permission.description: %emoji_no_entry% This command can only be used by admins.

could_not_write_file_folder.console: Could not create disable folder or file %error%

could_not_get.title: Could not Download
could_not_get.description: %emoji_error% The User never joined the server.

not_completely_disconnected.title: Not completely disconnected
not_completely_disconnected.description: %emoji_warning% The server [**${ip}**] is not completely disconnected. Please disconnect it manually by **deleting** the following file: `Server Folder/plugins/SMP-Plugin/connection.conn` or by **removing** the plugin completely.

automatically_disconnected.title: Automatically disconnected
automatically_disconnected.description: %emoji_warning% Automatically disconnected from the old server [**%ip%**] to ensure no complications happen.

not_connected.title: Not Connected
not_connected.description: %emoji_warning% Your server is not connected with the plugin.

no_response.title: Plugin does not respond
no_response.description: %emoji_error% Plugin doesn't respond. Please check if the server is online and the plugin enabled.

could_not_save_file.title: Could not Save
could_not_save_file.description: %emoji_error% Could not download file. Please try again.

could_not_update.title: Could not save
could_not_update.description: %emoji_error% Could not save connection. Please try again.

could_not_get_uuid.title: Could not Get UUID
could_not_get_uuid.description: %emoji_error% **%username%** is not a valid minecraft java edition account name.

could_not_read_server_file.title: Not Connected
could_not_read_server_file.description: %emoji_error% Your server is not connected. Please use `/connect plugin` or `/connect ftp` first.

could_not_read_user_file.title: Not Connected
could_not_read_user_file.description: %emoji_error% User never used `/connect account`! Instead of pinging someone you can also specify their **minecraft-username**.

no_permission.title: No Permission
no_permission.description: %emoji_no_entry% This button can only be used by admins.

could_not_disable.title: Could not Disable
could_not_disable.description: %emoji_error% Could not disable command [**%command_name%**]. Please try again.

no_permission.title: No Permission
no_permission.description: %emoji_no_entry% This button can only be used by admins.
